text: Glovelier was a municipality of the district of Del√©mont in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013, the former municipalities of Glovelier, Bassecourt, Courfaivre, Soulce and Undervelier merged into the new municipality of Haute-Sorne. ==Other websites== * Category:Former municipalities of Jura Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland
